title: Create Content Standards Request
description: Request parameters for creating a new content standards configuration

countries_all.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes. Standards apply in ALL listed countries (AND logic).

channels_any.description: Advertising channels. Standards apply to ANY of the listed channels (OR logic).

languages_any.description: BCP 47 language tags (e.g., 'en', 'de', 'fr'). Standards apply to content in ANY of these languages (OR logic). Content in unlisted languages is not covered by these standards.

policy.description: Natural language policy describing acceptable and unacceptable content contexts. Used by LLMs and human reviewers to make judgments.

calibration_exemplars.description: Training/test set to calibrate policy interpretation. Use URL references for pages to be fetched and analyzed, or full artifacts for pre-extracted content.

oneOf.description: URL reference - specific page to fetch and evaluate

type.description: Indicates this is a URL reference

value.description: Full URL to a specific page (e.g., 'https://espn.com/nba/story/_/id/12345/lakers-win')

language.description: BCP 47 language tag for content at this URL

oneOf.description: Full artifact with pre-extracted content (text, images, video, audio)
